idea-plugin.name: Search In Repository
idea-plugin.description:
Repository helper plugin


The plugin provides a query tool to search Maven or NPM dependencies info in the IDE


Maven:
  • Double-click a row of the artifact list to query all versions of the artifact
  • Double-click a version of the artifact list to query the details of that version
  • Copy the dependency information or click the button

NPM:
  • Get a list of related packages by searching keywords
  • Double-click a row of the package list to query all versions of the package

该插件提供一个查询工具方便在IDE中直接搜索Maven和NPM的依赖信息


Maven:
  • 双击Artifact列表的某一行查询Artifact所有版本
  • 双击Artifact列表的某一版本查询该版本的详情
  • 直接复制或者点击按钮复制依赖信息

NPM:
  • 搜索关键词，获取相关Package列表
  • 双击Package列表的某一项查询该Package的所有版本信息
